translations: 代金券，票券；收据，凭单；证人，保证人，证明者

sentences.sentence: This voucher can be redeemed at any of our branches.
sentences.translation: 这抵用券在我们的任一分支机构都可以使用。

sentences.sentence: This discount voucher entitles you to 10% off your next purchase.
sentences.translation: 这张优惠券可以使你下次购物时打九折。

sentences.sentence: "They would feel better or less pain, if they were handed cold, hard cash as opposed to a voucher," she said.
sentences.translation: 她说：“如果给他们的是现金而不是代金券，他们会感觉更好或更少痛苦。”
